quote_first: Were you on Carlin Street at approximately
quote_last: when Carietta White came out of the First Congregational Church on that street?
title: Carrie
author: Stephen King

quote_first: It was the twelfth of December, the twelfth month. A was twelve. The electric clock/radio by his bedside table said 12:01. A was waiting for it to read
quote_last: , he hoped there would be some sense of cosmic rightness when it did.
title: Boy A
author: Jonathan Trigell
